dialogueText: You continue to fight through the sewers and dungeons below Dracula's castle, making slow but steady progress towards your ultimate target.
As you hit a lull in the fighting, you're surprised to find Vita standing before you.
Vita!
How did she escape?
I'm only projecting to you, Dreamer.
Dracula has me back in his laboratory, but he's having difficulty keeping all five of us under control.
My sisters are running interference and keeping him occupied while I speak to you.
Isn't that dangerous? What if he notices?
Don't worry, he can't do anything to us, he needs us!
But I have to tell you, you need to hurry!
Dracula is –
Vita suddenly vanishes.
Vita?!
You wait for several moments, but she doesn't reappear.
Dreamer, we need to get to her quickly, we don't know what Dracula might do to her!
But what if she was warning you about something? You could be walking into a trap.
That's a definite possibility, but –
Dreamer!
Suddenly, Vita reappears.
Dracula has changed his plans! His machine is nearly ready to use again!
If the machine is ready, perhaps you should stay away from the laboratory. He wants to use you to control the World Stones, after all.
Yes, but he says he doesn't need you any more!
I don't know what he's up to, but you need to hurry!
Right, then let's get moving.
